1] CONIUM MACULATUM-40-Parts-Poison hemlock-
 Conium is an excellent remedy, such as difficult gait, trembling, sudden loss of strength while waking, painful stiffness of legs, etc. It corresponds to the debility, hypochondriasis, urinary troubles, weakened memory, sexual debility found here. General feeling as if bruised by blows. Weakness of body and mind, trembling, and palpitation. Cancerous diathesis, arterio-sclerosis, caries of sternum, enlarged glands. Acts on glandular system, insomnia of multiple neuritis.

2] RHUS TOXICODENDRON-40-Parts-Poison ivy-
 The effect on the skin, rheumatic pains, mucus membrane affections, and a typhoid type of fever, make this remedy frequently indicated. Rheu’s affects fibrous tissue markedly-joints, tendons, sheaths, aponeurosis, etc. Producing pains and stiffness. Tearing asunder pains. Septic conditions, cellulitis and infections, carbuncle in early stages, septicemia, rheumatism in cold season. Inflammation of GIT.

3] SYMPHYTUM OFFICINALE-20-Parts-Comfrey-Knitbone-
 It may be administered internally in the treatment of gastric and duodenal ulcers. Also in gastralgia and externally in pruritis ani. Injuries to sinews, tendons and the periosteum. Acts on joints generally, neuralgia, of knee. great use in wounds penetrating to perineum and bone, and in non-union of fractures, irritable bone at point of fracture.
